014package org.jdbi.v3.guava;
015
016import java.lang.reflect.ParameterizedType;
017import java.lang.reflect.Type;
018import java.lang.reflect.TypeVariable;
019import java.util.Comparator;
020import java.util.Map;
021import java.util.function.Supplier;
022import java.util.stream.Collector;
023
024import com.google.common.base.Optional;
025import com.google.common.collect.ArrayListMultimap;
026import com.google.common.collect.BiMap;
027import com.google.common.collect.HashBiMap;
028import com.google.common.collect.HashMultimap;
029import com.google.common.collect.ImmutableList;
030import com.google.common.collect.ImmutableListMultimap;
031import com.google.common.collect.ImmutableMap;
032import com.google.common.collect.ImmutableMultimap;
033import com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSet;
034import com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSetMultimap;
035import com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSortedSet;
036import com.google.common.collect.LinkedListMultimap;
037import com.google.common.collect.ListMultimap;
038import com.google.common.collect.Multimap;
039import com.google.common.collect.SetMultimap;
040import com.google.common.collect.TreeMultimap;
041import org.jdbi.v3.core.collector.CollectorFactory;
042import org.jdbi.v3.core.collector.OptionalCollectors;
043import org.jdbi.v3.core.internal.UtilityClassException;
044
045import static org.jdbi.v3.core.collector.MapCollectors.toMap;
046import static org.jdbi.v3.core.generic.GenericTypes.findGenericParameter;
047import static org.jdbi.v3.core.generic.GenericTypes.getErasedType;
048import static org.jdbi.v3.core.generic.GenericTypes.resolveMapEntryType;
049import static org.jdbi.v3.core.generic.GenericTypes.resolveType;
050
051/**
052 * Provides Collectors for Guava collection types.
053 * <p>Supported container types:</p>
054 * <ul>
055 * <li>com.google.common.base.Optional&lt;T&gt; (throws an exception if more than one row in result)</li>
056 * <li>com.google.common.collect.ImmutableList&lt;T&gt;</li>
057 * <li>com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSet&lt;T&gt;</li>
058 * <li>com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSortedSet&lt;T extends Comparable&gt;</li>
059 * </ul>
060 * <p>Supported Maps and Multimaps types - for rows mapped to Map.Entry&lt;K, V&gt;:</p>
061 * <ul>
062 * <li>com.google.common.collect.BiMap&lt;K, V&gt;</li>
063 * <li>com.google.common.collect.ImmutableMap&lt;K, V&gt;</li>
064 * <li>com.google.common.collect.Multimap&lt;K, V&gt;</li>
065 * <li>com.google.common.collect.ListMultimap&lt;K, V&gt;</li>
066 * <li>com.google.common.collect.ArrayListMultimap&lt;K, V&gt;</li>
067 * <li>com.google.common.collect.LinkedListMultimap&lt;K, V&gt;</li>
068 * <li>com.google.common.collect.SetMultimap&lt;K, V&gt;</li>
069 * <li>com.google.common.collect.HashMultimap&lt;K, V&gt;</li>
070 * <li>com.google.common.collect.TreeMultimap&lt;K, V&gt;</li>
071 * <li>com.google.common.collect.ImmutableMultimap&lt;K, V&gt;</li>
072 * <li>com.google.common.collect.ImmutableListMultimap&lt;K, V&gt;</li>
073 * <li>com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSetMultimap&lt;K, V&gt;</li>
074 * </ul>
075 */
076public class GuavaCollectors {
077    private GuavaCollectors() {
078        throw new UtilityClassException();
079    }
080
081    /**
082     * Returns a {@code CollectorFactory} which knows how to create all supported Guava types.
083     *
084     * @return A {@code CollectorFactory} which knows how to create all supported Guava types
085     */
086    public static CollectorFactory factory() {
087        return new Factory();
088    }
089
090    /**
091     * Returns a {@code Collector} that accumulates 0 or 1 input elements into Guava's {@code Optional<T>}.
092     * The returned collector will throw {@code IllegalStateException} whenever 2 or more elements
093     * are present in a stream. Null elements are mapped to {@code Optional.absent()}.
094     *
095     * @param <T> the collected type
096     * @return a {@code Collector} which collects 0 or 1 input elements into a Guava {@code Optional<T>}.
097     */
098    public static <T> Collector<T, ?, Optional<T>> toOptional() {
099        return OptionalCollectors.toOptional(Optional::absent, Optional::of);
100    }
101
102    /**
103     * Returns a {@code Collector} that accumulates {@code Map.Entry<K, V>} input elements into an
104     * {@code ImmutableMap<K, V>}.
105     *
106     * @param <K> the type of map keys
107     * @param <V> the type of map values
108     * @return a {@code Collector} which collects map entry elements into an {@code ImmutableMap},
109     * in encounter order.
110     */
111    public static <K, V> Collector<Map.Entry<K, V>, ?, ImmutableMap<K, V>> toImmutableMap() {
112        return ImmutableMap.toImmutableMap(Map.Entry::getKey, Map.Entry::getValue);
113    }
114
115    /**
116     * Returns a {@code Collector} that accumulates {@code Map.Entry<K, V>} input elements into a
117     * {@code HashBiMap<K, V>}. The returned collector will throw {@code IllegalStateException}
118     * whenever a set of input elements contains multiple entries with the same key.
119     *
120     * @param <K> the type of map keys
121     * @param <V> the type of map values
122     * @return a {@code Collector} which collects map entry elements into a {@code HashBiMap},
123     * in encounter order.
124     */
125    public static <K, V> Collector<Map.Entry<K, V>, ?, BiMap<K, V>> toHashBiMap() {
126        return toMap(HashBiMap::create);
127    }
128
129    /**
130     * Returns a {@code Collector} that accumulates {@code Map.Entry<K, V>} input elements into an
131     * {@code ImmutableListMultimap<K, V>}.
132     *
133     * @param <K> the type of map keys
134     * @param <V> the type of map values
135     * @return a {@code Collector} which collects map entry elements into an {@code ImmutableListMultimap},
136     * in encounter order.
137     */
138    public static <K, V> Collector<Map.Entry<K, V>, ?, ImmutableListMultimap<K, V>> toImmutableListMultimap() {
139        return Collector.of(
140                ImmutableListMultimap::<K, V>builder,
141                ImmutableListMultimap.Builder::put,
142                GuavaCollectors::combine,
143                ImmutableListMultimap.Builder::build);
144    }
145
146    /**
147     * Returns a {@code Collector} that accumulates {@code Map.Entry<K, V>} input elements into an
148     * {@code ImmutableSetMultimap<K, V>}.
149     *
150     * @param <K> the type of map keys
151     * @param <V> the type of map values
152     * @return a {@code Collector} which collects map entry elements into an {@code ImmutableSetMultimap},
153     * in encounter order.
154     */
155    public static <K, V> Collector<Map.Entry<K, V>, ?, ImmutableSetMultimap<K, V>> toImmutableSetMultimap() {
156        return Collector.of(
157                ImmutableSetMultimap::<K, V>builder,
158                ImmutableSetMultimap.Builder::put,
159                GuavaCollectors::combine,
160                ImmutableSetMultimap.Builder::build);
161    }
162
163    /**
164     * Returns a {@code Collector} that accumulates {@code Map.Entry<K, V>} input elements into an
165     * {@code ArrayListMultimap<K, V>}.
166     *
167     * @param <K> the type of map keys
168     * @param <V> the type of map values
169     * @return a {@code Collector} which collects map entry elements into an {@code ArrayListMultimap},
170     * in encounter order.
171     */
172    public static <K, V> Collector<Map.Entry<K, V>, ?, ArrayListMultimap<K, V>> toArrayListMultimap() {
173        return toMultimap(ArrayListMultimap::create);
174    }
175
176    /**
177     * Returns a {@code Collector} that accumulates {@code Map.Entry<K, V>} input elements into a
178     * {@code LinkedListMultimap<K, V>}.
179     *
180     * @param <K> the type of map keys
181     * @param <V> the type of map values
182     * @return a {@code Collector} which collects map entry elements into a {@code LinkedListMultimap},
183     * in encounter order.
184     */
185    public static <K, V> Collector<Map.Entry<K, V>, ?, LinkedListMultimap<K, V>> toLinkedListMultimap() {
186        return toMultimap(LinkedListMultimap::create);
187    }
188
189    /**
190     * Returns a {@code Collector} that accumulates {@code Map.Entry<K, V>} input elements into a
191     * {@code HashMultimap<K, V>}.
192     *
193     * @param <K> the type of map keys
194     * @param <V> the type of map values
195     * @return a {@code Collector} which collects map entry elements into a {@code ArrayListMultimap},
196     * in encounter order.
197     */
198    public static <K, V> Collector<Map.Entry<K, V>, ?, HashMultimap<K, V>> toHashMultimap() {
199        return toMultimap(HashMultimap::create);
200    }
201
202    /**
203     * Returns a {@code Collector} that accumulates {@code Map.Entry<K, V>} input elements into a
204     * {@code TreeMultimap<K, V>}.
205     *
206     * @param <K> the type of map keys
207     * @param <V> the type of map values
208     * @return a {@code Collector} which collects map entry elements into a {@code TreeMultimap},
209     * in encounter order.
210     */
211    public static <K extends Comparable, V extends Comparable> Collector<Map.Entry<K, V>, ?, TreeMultimap<K, V>> toTreeMultimap() {
212        return toMultimap(TreeMultimap::create);
213    }
214
215    /**
216     * Returns a {@code Collector} that accumulates {@code Map.Entry<K, V>} input elements into a
217     * {@code Multimap<K, V>} of the supplied type.
218     *
219     * @param <K>             the type of map keys
220     * @param <V>             the type of map values
221     * @param <M>             a supplier of your multimap type
222     * @param multimapFactory a {@code Supplier} which return a new, empty {@code Multimap} of the appropriate type.
223     * @return a {@code Collector} which collects map entry elements into a {@code Multiamp}, in encounter order.
224     */
225    public static <K, V, M extends Multimap<K, V>> Collector<Map.Entry<K, V>, ?, M> toMultimap(Supplier<M> multimapFactory) {
226        return Collector.of(
227                multimapFactory,
228                GuavaCollectors::putEntry,
229                GuavaCollectors::combine);
230    }
231
232    private static <K, V, M extends Multimap<K, V>> void putEntry(M map, Map.Entry<K, V> entry) {
233        map.put(entry.getKey(), entry.getValue());
234    }
235
236    private static <K, V, M extends Multimap<K, V>> M combine(M a, M b) {
237        a.putAll(b);
238        return a;
239    }
240
241    private static <K, V, MB extends ImmutableMultimap.Builder<K, V>> MB combine(MB a, MB b) {
242        a.putAll(b.build());
243        return a;
244    }
245
246    private static class Factory implements CollectorFactory {
247        private final TypeVariable<Class<Multimap>> multimapKey;
248        private final TypeVariable<Class<Multimap>> multimapValue;
249
250        Factory() {
251            TypeVariable<Class<Multimap>>[] multimapParams = Multimap.class.getTypeParameters();
252            multimapKey = multimapParams[0];
253            multimapValue = multimapParams[1];
254        }
255
256        private final Map<Class<?>, Collector<?, ?, ?>> collectors =
257            ImmutableMap.<Class<?>, Collector<?, ?, ?>>builder()
258                .put(ImmutableList.class, ImmutableList.toImmutableList())
259                .put(ImmutableSet.class, ImmutableSet.toImmutableSet())
260                .put(ImmutableSortedSet.class, ImmutableSortedSet.toImmutableSortedSet(Comparator.naturalOrder()))
261                .put(Optional.class, toOptional())
262                .put(ImmutableMap.class, toImmutableMap())
263                .put(BiMap.class, toHashBiMap())
264                .put(ImmutableMultimap.class, toImmutableListMultimap())
265                .put(ImmutableListMultimap.class, toImmutableListMultimap())
266                .put(ImmutableSetMultimap.class, toImmutableSetMultimap())
267                .put(Multimap.class, toImmutableListMultimap())
268                .put(ListMultimap.class, toImmutableListMultimap())
269                .put(ArrayListMultimap.class, toArrayListMultimap())
270                .put(LinkedListMultimap.class, toLinkedListMultimap())
271                .put(SetMultimap.class, toImmutableSetMultimap())
272                .put(HashMultimap.class, toHashMultimap())
273                .put(TreeMultimap.class, toTreeMultimap())
274                .build();
275
276        @Override
277        public boolean accepts(Type containerType) {
278            Class<?> erasedType = getErasedType(containerType);
279            return collectors.containsKey(erasedType) && containerType instanceof ParameterizedType;
280        }
281
282        @Override
283        public java.util.Optional<Type> elementType(Type containerType) {
284            Class<?> erasedType = getErasedType(containerType);
285
286            if (Multimap.class.isAssignableFrom(erasedType)) {
287                Type keyType = resolveType(multimapKey, containerType);
288                Type valueType = resolveType(multimapValue, containerType);
289                return java.util.Optional.of(resolveMapEntryType(keyType, valueType));
290            } else if (Map.class.isAssignableFrom(erasedType)) {
291                return java.util.Optional.of(resolveMapEntryType(containerType));
292            }
293
294            return findGenericParameter(containerType, erasedType);
295        }
296
297        @Override
298        public Collector<?, ?, ?> build(Type containerType) {
299            return collectors.get(getErasedType(containerType));
300        }
301    }
302}
